amendment.description: Amendment requires studies on Federal procurement and contracting policies to be submitted to all relevant Congressional committees; and requires studies on the conservation implications of widespread telecommuting by Federal employees and the merits of establishing performance measures to reduce petroleum consumption by Federal fleets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 108-69 to clarify that reports relating to federal procurement policy and federal contracting policy should be submitted to all relevant Congressional committees. The amendment also requires a study of the energy conservation benefits of telecommuting by federal employees and a study of the merits of establishing performance measures to guide the reduction of petroleum consumption by federal fleets.
